paper_abstract: The alpha mistake of Taguchi method is investigated for the smaller-the-better type quality characteristic with L-18 (2(1) x 3(7)) array using simulation. The results showed that the Taguchi method might result in identifying incorrectly some insignificant factors as significant. In conclusion, Taguchi's quality engineering concepts are valuable, but his statistical tools, including: signal-to-noise ratio, testing at F value of four and pooling-up techniques, are found inefficient tools for robust design.
paper_title: Alpha mistake of Taguchi method with L-18 array for STB type QCH using simulation
